# oatmeal

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`oatmeal` helps survey researchers quickly wrangle their data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of oatmeal from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jjmoncus/oatmeal")
```
